You don't get a repeat of me naked dude." Joey says attempting to strip off the diaper. "Dude at least do it in the bathroom." Tristan tells Joey, who is now butt naked. Joey gets dressed and heads home. Joey goes to bed hoping the next day will be better. The next morning Joey wakes up to find that he wet the bed. "What is going on?" Joey wondered.
1231222.title: Joey goes home but wets the bed.

info.description:
Joey and Tristan are both in a heated daring contest. One of the dares end with Joey Wheeler in diapers.

No character deaths please.
Add a chapter but at least give it a solid paragraph.
write a chapter and I'll write a chapter on one of your stories.
Most importantly enjoy.
